data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Bougainville, Papua New Guinea. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bougainville, Papua New Guinea
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Bougainville, Papua New Guinea to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Bougainville.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Bougainville, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Jew, English-speaking people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Bougainville, Papua New Guinea. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, remind your church in Bougainville that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Father, help the 30,557 believers in Bougainville to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

location.name: Bougainville
location.people_groups_list: Kamura, Angave, Kanum, Enkelembu, Aramo, Baibai
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kamura (1,600), Angave (3,900), Kanum, Enkelembu (400), Aramo (900), Baibai (600)
